p: The primers designed for detection of the targeted species were given in Table 2. The 16S rRNA sequences of F. succinogenes and R. ablus, and the 18S rRNA sequences of the fungi and protozoa were downloaded from GenBank (National Center for Biotechnology Information, Bethesda, MD, USA). The sequence specific regions for a given species (with > 97% similarity) were designed online against the GenBank sequences with Primer Premier 3.0 ( http://bioinfo.ut.ee/primer3-0.4.0/primer3/) to ensure primer specificity. All primers were tested for the requirements imposed by quantitative realâ€”time PCR. The housekeeping gene was tested, and no significant effects were found ( P > 0.05). The oligonucleotides were synthesized by Sangon Biological Engineering (Shanghai, China).
